description:
To counter the Uniformers, an item arrives for Raika, who has been making efforts. This item reaffirms Raika`s determination. Yu-yu, Tohya, Urara, and Megumi, as well as Danji, Mirei, and Taizo, devote themselves to training with the help of their allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たな装い[ドレスアップ]
